title: My Name Is... (SCP-7604 Art)
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

= [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7604 The shot pans and follows The Girl, wearing a long orange dress, out in the street. She is dancing raucously, flowing her dress around her to the music.]

= [[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:my-name-is/IMG_0082.png]]  

> Fanart of [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7604 SCP-7604]! Absolutely loved this SCP, one of my new favourites, truly. Thought I'd do a lil sketch of the lass herself <3 If you like this, you should check out my [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-vikki-lost Author Page!] It has a LOT more art on it, if you click all the links <3
> 
> Have a lovely-dove day, ya'll!
author: Dr Vikki Lost
